channel.title: Blogging on Ebby Builds!
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on Ebby Builds!

item.title: Getting Hugo Running with Tranquilpeak on Modern Hugo (v0.156+)
item.description: Tranquilpeak is still one of the most elegant Hugo themes around, but it was built for an older Hugo. Here are all the fixes you need to get it running on Hugo v0.156+, collected in one place so you don’t have to go hunting.
